### Installation

```{r TranslaSeq_install, message = FALSE, prompt = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("franciscodavid/TranslaSeq")
```

### Documentation

#### Vignette

You can find an explanation of how TranslaSeq works with an included use example
into the [package GitHub page](https://franciscodavid.github.io/TranslaSeq/vignette.html).

#### R documentation files

To explore the package documentation, see the package help.

```{r TranslaSeq_pkg_help, mesage = FALSE, promtp = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
?`TranslaSeq-package`
```

You can also go directly to the `TranslaSeq()` function documentation:

```{r TranslaSeq_func_help, mesage = FALSE, promtp = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
?TranslaSeq
```
